name: NOTE_ATTACHED_IMG
description: Stores the document IDs of images attached to the note from Canto.

columns.name: NOTE_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the note record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the attached image associated with this note. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: NOTE_IMG_DOC_ID
columns.description: Stores the storage ID of images attached to the note from Canto.
